comment: Mode: 'simulation' = fully automated including table creation, 'normal' = user creates table but everything else automated

unity.comment: pauseDebuggerOnIssue: If true, Unity will call Debug.Break() when critical issues are detected (requires debugger attached)

investigation.comment: Investigation phase: Monitor waits this many seconds to gather related issues before pausing debugger. Set to 0 to pause immediately.

login.comment: Password can be set via environment variable MONITOR_PASSWORD for security (overrides this value)

simulation.comment: Only used in simulation mode - auto-create and start simulation table
simulation.comment2: itemAnteEnabled: If true, enables item ante (For Keeps) system for monitor-created simulation tables
